328340.「お集まりの 皆さまぁ～っ！ 記念すべき\n 第１２回 アストルティア・ナイト\:
Laaaadies and gentlemen! Allow me to introduce
the contestants of the 12th Astoltia Knight
Contest!

328341.「前大会で 好成績をおさめ \n 見事 出場権を獲得した ３名に加えて～……:
And now, joining the 3 winners from
last year's tournament...

328342.「ファルパパ神による特別推薦枠 ２名と！\n 総勢４８人の予選を勝ち抜いた ３名:
We've got 2 special recommendations from
Falpapa himself, as well as 3 winners from 48
contestants! 8 hotties will battle it out!

328343.「まずは 前大会の覇者の 入場だぁっ！\n 満を持しての登場から 熱狂的な投票を:
First upーour first place winner from last
time! Making his grand entrance and winning
over his voters...he finally claimed the top!

328344.「厚い胸板と 対照的に くびれた腰っ！\n ホットなバディは その大斧同様 破壊:
He's got a slim waist but a thick chest!
This hot body will destroy you just as much as
his axe! The Scorching-Hot Prince...Gilgaran!

328345.「去年の戦いで 俺が ナイトの座に輝けたのは\n 王座こそが 俺に ふさわしい場:
I was crowned Knight last year because sitting
on the throne is where I truly belong.
And you all proved that to me...

328346.「今年も 俺がナイトの座を勝ち取り その栄光を\n さらに 確かなモノにしてみせ:
I will become Knight once again this year, and
show you true glory! A true champion seizes
victory again and again!

328347.「お前たち……再び 俺のもとに集うがいい！\n そうすれば 他では絶対に 味わえ:
Gather close to me once again, everyone!
Do that, and I promise you the ultimate
dreamーone you won't see anywhere else!

328348.「続いては 準ナイトの おでましだぁ～っ！！\n じわじわと 順位を上げ ついに:
Next up, is our runner up Knight! Slowly, but
surely rising the ranks, he's made his way to
second place! The dandiest of the dandy!

328349.「頼れるパパなのに 意外と姫ポジ！？\n 妻子との幸せを アストルティア全土から:
A dependable father, yet praised like a princess?! All of Astoltia prays for his happiness with his wife and child! The
Top Time Traveler, Padre!

328350.「今年は 夫婦共々 このようなコンテストに\n 出場できたこと 光栄に思う。\n:
Both my wife and I are honored to be a part of
the contest this year. Allow me to thank each
and every one of you.

328351.「クイーンコンテストでの マローネの奮闘ぶりは\n 見事だった。今度は あなたが:
Marone's efforts in the Queen Contest were
quite impressive. She's inspired me...so now
it's my turn to give it my all.

328352.「マローネと誓った 夢に近づくため\n そして 愛する我が子のため 俺は 今年こ:
For the sake of Marone's dream, and for my
beloved <if_woman>daughter<else>son<endif>,
I will become this year's Knight!

328353.「その認知度はもはや アストルティアの\n 国民的ヒーロー！ 並ぶ者なき 三連覇:
His recognition now rivals that of a national
hero of Astoltia! Can he once again prove his
unfaltering pride as a three-time champion?!

328354.「ナイトコンテストは こいつがいなきゃ\n 始まらないじぇ～！\n 神出鬼没の:
The Knight Contest is nothing without THIS
guy! The lone swordsman who comes and
goes... Hyuza!

328355.「……ったく……新顔どもが騒いでて\n ここんとこ いいとこなしだぜ。:
Jeez... These newcomers won't shut up and
nothin' good's been going on lately.

328356.「だが それも もう終わりだ。\n ここらでナイトを奪還して 格の違いを\n 証:
But that's all over now. It's about time I reclaimed the title of Knight and showed these guys what class really is. That's what being
the real deal is, right?

328357.「真のアストルティア・ナイトは 誰か……\n あんたらは もう わかってるよな？:
"Who is the true Astoltia Knight?" You already know the answer to that, don't you? I'll take the top once again and show you how
its done!

328358.「続いて ファルパパちゃんによる\n 特別推薦枠 ２名を ご紹介だよぉーっ！:
Next, I'd like to introduce the two specially
recommended by Falpapa!

328359.「まずは この方が 超超ひさしぶりに登場だぁ！\n ワイルド・アンド・ダンディで:
First upーthis guy hasn't shown up in a really, REALLY long time! His charm can captivate any crowd! The Wild and Dandy
Entertainer, Nablette!

328366.「ここからは 激しい予選を勝ち抜いた\n 強豪が 続々登場だじぇ～！ まずは こ:
From here on out, our strong competitors who won the qualifying rounds will come out one after the other! First up...this guy's fierce
popularity shows no signs of stopping!

328367.「永遠のロマンスが 巻きおこした\n 爆発的人気という旋風は もしや 永遠に\n:
This eternal romance sparked a whirlwind of explosive popularity...could it continue to rage on forever?! The Intrepid Investigator,
Rahul!

328370.「続いては 予選通過 第２位のこの方！\n なんと 今年も会場で 主従が再会しま:
Next up is our second place finisher in the preliminaries! How amazing! Both master and servant reunited here once again! The Staunch
Swordsman...Faras!

328371.「じゃじゃーん！ 記念すべき \n 第１２回 アストルティア・ナイト\n コンテ:
Ta-dah! I will now announce the results of
the 12th Astoltia Knight Contest!

328372.「さあさあ！ ホワイトショコラ城の\n ナイトの座は 誰の手に！？\n 耳の穴か:
Come, now! Who will be the Knight of the
White Chocolate Castle? Clear your ears and
listen well!

328373.「いっくよ～！\n みんなっ ステージに 注目するべ～しっ！！:
Here we go!
Ladies and gentlemen, please turn your
attention to the stage!!

329393.「へへっ。ひさしぶりの参加となっちまったが\n ご観覧の皆様を 楽しませる 心意:
Heh heh! Been a while since I last
participated, but you bet your bottom I
haven't forgotten how to please the crowd!

329394.「よっ ほっ ほっ ほっ……！\n 最後まで 楽しんでってくれよな。:
Yup hup hup hup!
I hope you enjoy the show!

329395.「続いて 正真正銘の ニューカマー！\n ピッチピチの 新顔が 電撃降臨だじぇ～:
Next up is the real dealーa geniune newcomer!
This fresh face makes his dramatic entrance!!

329396.「幼い外見と ケモミミの 禁断のコンボ！\n その純真一途さに 誰もが ノックア:
A young look and fuzzy earsーa forbidden combo! His innocence and devotion will really knock your socks off! The Boy Wolf of the
Unknown... Lycae!

329397.「ラキは……こんなに大勢の人 初めて見た。\n ちょっと 怖い……。:
This is...the first time Lycae has seen this
many people... He's a bit scared...

329398.「でも ねえさまに言われた。\n がんばって 勝ってきなさいって。:
But my big sister said he should do his
best and to win.

329399.「だから ラキは 役目を 果たす！\n アストルティア・ナイトに なってみせる！:
So, Lycae will fulfill his duty!
He will become an Astoltia Knight!

329400.「いつも 応援 ありがとう。\n 優勝なんて 月をつかむような話だが\n 俺は:
Thank you for your continued support!
Winning is like reaching for the moon...I
won't stop until it is in my hand!

329401.「それが あの娘のためにもなると 信じている！\n 俺が ナイトの座に 返り咲く:
I believe that it is for "her" sake, too!
To reclaim my title as Knight, I humbly ask
that you lend me your strength!

329402.「我が主に こうして また再会できるとは……\n 毎年のコンテストに 感謝いたし:
I never imagined I'd be able to see my lord
once again... I am quite grateful for this
yearly contest!

329403.「今年は マローネ様も この愉快な祭りに\n 参加されていらっしゃったとか。\n:
I heard that Lady Marone took part as well.
I would've liked to greet her if given the
chance.

329404.「我が主や 奥方様の手前 恥ずかしい姿は\n 見せられませんな。このファラス\n:
Given that my lord and his lady are both here,
I cannot show them any shame. I, Faras, will
not falter!

329405.「そして 最後は～！！\n ついにっ この男が！！\n 圧倒的人気を 引っさげて:
And last, but not least! Finally, it's *HIM*!
As he makes his entrance, his overwhelming
popularity is not far behind!

329406.「おクチも性格も 激辛なのにっ\n なぜか 女子たちの黄色い悲鳴が止まらない<h:
For such a spicy way with words and a personality to match, the girls just can't stop screaming! I'm sure you were all waiting
for this too, huuh?!

329407.「学生服に 身を包んだ ザ・性悪男っ\n 気まぐれバンビーノ リソル～！:
Clad in a school uniform and the ultimate
bad boyーthe Baffling Bambino, Resol!

329408.「……は？ オレ くだらない余興に\n 付き合うほど ヒマじゃないんだけど。\n:
...Huh? I don't have time to deal with this
pointless charade. And calling me "bad boy"?
Are you for real? I'm outta here.

329409.「って うおおおーい！\n ちょい待ち ちょい待ち！\n キミに帰られると 本気:
H-hey!!! Wait, stop!
I'd get in real trouble if you left...!

329410.「……ハァ。\n よく知らないけど 票を\n たくさん 集めれば いいわけ？:
*sigh*... I'm not really sure what this is
all about, but I guess it's good if I get lots
of votes?

329411.「やってあげるよ。オレには 下僕……じゃなくて\n 心優しい先輩が ついてるから:
I'll do it, then. I've got a real kind-hearted
serva...I mean, superior by my side.
Riiiight, teach? ♪

329412.「以上っ！ ８名のイケメンが\n ナイトの座をかけ コンテストを争っちゃうよ！:
And that's all, folks! These eight handsome
men will compete for the title of Knight!

329413.「栄光の座に かがやくのは 誰か……\n それを決めるのは！\n こ・こ・に・い:
Who will be crowned with glory...? It's up to
you to decide! All! Of! You!

329414.「さ～て どう？ どう？ <pc>。 \n ちょーイケメンが 大集合だけど\n:
Well? Well? There are so many gorgeous men
here, but which one is your honest favorite?

329415.「アストルティア・ナイトに ふさわしいと思う \n イケメンを選んだら\n キミ:
When you've made your choice of who you think
is worthy, make sure to cast your vote!

329416.「投票は 私の カワイイ妹っ！\n 集計係モカの所で 受け付けてるからね！: Give your votes to my cute sister, Mocha!

329417.「ナイトに 投票し終わったら\n 話すことがあるから メリルの所に 来るべし！\:
After you've chosen your votes, come see me!
I'll be waiting for you outside, I promise!
